com.peterverzijl.softwaresystems.qwirkle.networking

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.peterverzijl.softwaresystems.qwirkle.networking.Client
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Client
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Client class for the chatting feature in the Qwirkle game.
    Version:
    1.0a
    Author:
    Peter Verzijl

    • Constructor Detail

      • Client

        public Client(java.net.InetAddress host,
              int port,
              ChatView viewer)
       throws java.io.IOException
        Constructs a Client-object and tries to make a socket connection.
        Parameters:
        host - The Internet address where the client is connecting to.
        port - The port of the server to connect to.
        viewer - The UI viewer of the chat.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - When either the in or out streams of the socket can't be opened.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Reads the messages in the socket connection. Each message will be forwarded to the MessageUI
